schema.description: Request to create a new AI agent.

agent_type.description: Agent type: autonomous, copilot, workflow, orchestrator.

backup_owner_id.description: Backup owner ID for governance continuity (F108).

inactivity_threshold_days.description: Days of inactivity before agent enters grace period (F108).

max_token_lifetime_secs.description: Maximum OAuth token lifetime in seconds. Default: 900 (15 min).

owner_id.description: User ID of the agent owner.

requires_human_approval.description: Require human approval for sensitive operations.

risk_level.description: Risk level: low, medium, high, critical. Default: medium.

team_id.description: Team/group ID associated with this agent.

schema.title: CreateAgentRequest
